verbose_text: To verify if specific blockade of HIF-lalpha inhibits cell proliferation under normoxia and hypoxia, we assayed cell viability in each group of cells transfected with HIF-lalpha miRNA, Scrambled miRNA (control) or untreated (PBS), for 24, 48 and 72 h. Specific blockade of HIF-lalpha by miRNA inhibited proliferation at 24 h in A549 cells under hypoxia; following treatment with 150 mumol/l CoCl 2 for 48 and 72 h, the difference remained (XREF_FIG).
